title: Blessing's First 45 Minutes Playing Zelda: Tears of The Kingdom
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY for 50% off 2 or more pairs of polarized sunglasses

2 weeks ago, Blessing got the code for The Legend of Zelda: Tears of The Kingdom and immediately went home, started the game, and pressed record. Here is his first 45 minutes playing the brand new Zelda game.

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
